text: Ani amhi tyancyamage mariyama-putra isala pathavile, je apalya purvica grantha taurata satya asalyace sangata hote ani amhi tyanna injila (ha grantha) pradana kela. Jyata nura (divya prakasa) ani margadarsana hote ani to apalya purvica grantha taurata satya asalyace sangata hota ani te spasta margadarsana ani sikavana hoti, allahace bhaya rakhanaryankarita
